title: SwapMsg
description: This is the message for swapping contract token on osmosis via ibc

channel.description: The local channel to send the packets on

remote_address.description: The remote address to send the swapt token to. Don't use HumanAddress as this will likely have a different Bech32 prefix than we use and cannot be validated locally

pool_id.description: pool on osmosis to swap token on

exact_amount_out.description: Exact token out after swap on osmosis pool

timeout.description: How long the packet lives in seconds. If not specified, use default_timeout
